dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 452 IH: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 324 West Saint Louis Street in Pacific, Missouri, as the “Specialist Jeffrey L. White, Jr. Post Office”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Luetkemeyer (for himself, Mr. Clay, Mrs. Wagner, Mrs. Hartzler, Mr. Cleaver, Mr. Graves of Missouri, Mr. Long, Mr. Smith of Missouri, and Mr. Sessions) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

form.official-title: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 324 West Saint Louis Street in Pacific, Missouri, as the Specialist Jeffrey L. White, Jr. Post Office.

section.header: Specialist Jeffrey L. White, Jr. Post Office

subsection.text: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 324 West Saint Louis Street in Pacific, Missouri, shall be known and designated as the Specialist Jeffrey L. White, Jr. Post Office.

Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the Specialist Jeffrey L. White, Jr. Post Office.
